SHOULDERS // HAMSTRINGS // QUADS // PECS

built using aircraft grade

aluminium

Developed in Britain using high-grade aerospace aluminium, the Pulsio Air is built with meticulous attention to detail.

We use only the finest quality materials on the market, which have proven to offer superior durability against knocks and falls while also achieving impressive noise reduction characteristics.

A New Generation Of Power

A New Generation Of Power

Designed by our in-house technology team, the Pulsio AIR is equipped with our IRIS 20 brushless motor which delivers over 50% greater power and percussive therapy than the average massage gun on the market.

0%

Deeper Muscle Penetration

Extended depth to 14mm means that each individual percussion does not simply vibrate the exterior of the muscle, but stimulates movement deep within the muscle tissue fibres.

The Pulsio Air has proven to deliver up to 30% improved muscle depth penetration vs the average massager, giving users a superior deep tissue massage for pre/post-workout.

We dispatch all orders from UK hub within 24 hours Monday-Friday and send with Royal Mail 48 Hour Tracked Delivery as standard. If you need it sooner, we also offer Royal Mail 24 Hour Tracked which will arrive within 1-2 days from dispatch.
